column5: 225hp Verado! she's gonna fly
awsome ride love my pro-v
Wow, thanks for the boat porn!  Congrats on the ride.  She's a beauty!

The Tragically Hip sang it best  It's been a long time running. It's been a long time coming.. It's been a long, long, long time running... It's well worth the wait  The plan to own a fishing boat that my wife and I will be able to enjoy for decades has been 5 years in the making and this dream is now becoming a reality  Here's a quick look at the latest addition to the family!        She's got a few rigging issues that are being worked out while we continue to finish the interior of the garage in time for her arrival within 2 weeks!  Tony
That is a BEAUTY Tony! Congrats to you you'll love it. But if they offer you the 'L' hat, DON'T take it!  ps. Speak to Irishfield about rigging issues.
OH BABY!!!!! Cant wait till i get my first water chrome!!!!  Congradulations!
Nice boat.  I got up close and personal with one of those here, very dreamy.  Very nice rig.  I had to settle with the little cousin.  Way to go.  Bet you can't wait to get it wet!!!!
Great lookin' ride!!!!  Congrats!  We look forward to many reports with the boat in the background!
What a great looking boat! I can only dream of when I can own one like that..
Great looking rig Tony, congrats and enjoy.
Those seats are like Recaros... Congrats on your purchase!
thats a sexy machine
thats a sexy ride.   what made you decide on the pro-v?
Very nice boat!!! Oh too dream to be able to park a boat that size in my 17" garage
Sweet ride Tony, you deserve it.
very nice boat, congrats!

So many reasons...but some off the top of my head beyond the quality and durability of a riveted aluminum hull...  It's a very stable platform that will allow me to fish for any species of fish using a wide variety of techniques and not be limited to small water as a large portion of my fishing will be out on the Great lakes, Simcoe, etc..  I can do it all out of this boat...  Trolling in all forms (Downrigging, Planer boards, dipsy divers) Drift fishing rivers Casting for bass or musky Dragging baits for walleye or bass with drift socks Night fishing for variety of species Inclement weather fishing, under the top set and full windshield (even a propane heater if it got that cold!)  I can also use it as a scuba diving platform, tubing or waterskiing, fireworks cruises in the summer, etc, etc, etc  The size also allows me to have more anglers on board, especially when trolling when it helps to run more rods.  Man I'm pumped!

youll love this boat and congrads.........ive had mine for a few years now ...and for all the reasons youve described........  and it handles wonderfully......weve fished 4 in it...and what a stable boat it is....   once again.........   WELCOME TO THE CLUB!!!!
very nice rig!  Probably cost a lot more than my first house!!!LOL
That's a fishin' machine!  Can I be your friend?
Wow, that is sweet for sure Tony  Can I have a ride  Joey
nice boat   I need a better paying job
SWEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEET!!!!  That's about all I can say about that....LOL
My dream boat! Congrats!

Im going to join in on this one Tony.......... It was a lonnnnng time commmmming... WTG and congrats... I truly know you'll enjoy every moment.....  The first scratch she gets will suck forever in your mind.....................ONLY! .but it will happen.........relax about it now.
Very nice fishing machine Tony! I'm sure the wait will be worth it and you will enjoy her for many years!  What size is the main engine?

Congrats Tony, I know you've looked forward to this for a long time. You should be especially proud of having a long term plan, and sticking to it. That baby will be packed with a ton of memories over the next few years!! Way to go buddy.
Great lookin' ride!!...I can just picture the smile on your face once you get er out on the water
